Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: மனநலம் நன்குடைய ராயினும் சான்றோர்க்கு இனநலம் ஏமாப் புடைத்து.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Although they may have great (natural) goodness of mind, yet good society will tend to strengthen it.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A virtuous and wise person ('சான்றோர்') is shown. They already possess a strong inner light, representing their inherent goodness of mind ('மனநலம் நன்குடையர்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: They are surrounded by a fellowship of other wise and virtuous people ('இனநலம்'). This group creates a second, even more powerful, protective layer of golden light around the individual, fortifying their existing inner strength.
Layered_Composition.Background: A challenging or tempting landscape, from which the combined light of the individual and the group provides a powerful, secure defense ('ஏமாப்புடைத்து').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Even for those who are already virtuous, good company provides an essential source of strength and protection.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The two layers of light—the inner light of the individual and the outer, reinforcing light from the group—are the key visual. This shows good company not as a replacement for inner virtue, but as a crucial reinforcement.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Strengthening, protective, secure, reinforcing, communal virtue.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The inner light is a steady, bright white. The outer light from the group is a powerful, warm gold. The combination of the two creates an almost impenetrable shield of brilliance.

Technical_Cues.Camera: Medium shot, centered on the individual, clearly showing the two layers of light and the supportive presence of the companions.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with ethereal and powerful light aura effects.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Multi-layered volumetric lighting to create the distinct inner and outer auras.

Cultural_Anchors: The synergy of individual and collective virtue.

Negative_Prompt: person's light being drained by the group, dark auras, text artifacts, cartoonish.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the interaction of the two light auras.
